Text: KERP Communication and Certificatepst The Bankruptcy Court order authorizing the Key Employee Retention Liquidation Incentive and Severance Plan the KERP requires that before receiving any payment under the KERP each participant certify that he or she has not engaged in insider trading of the Companys stock To receive any KERP payment you must print complete and return the attached certificate If you wish to review Enrons policy regarding insider trading you can find the Securities Trades by Company Personnel section of the Code of Ethics at resourcespoliciescodeofethicscodeofethicspdf To ensure that you receive your first payment you should Completely and legibly fill out the form Deliver it to the designated receptacle in the lobby on the th floor by no later than pm Monday June Do not drop it in the mail Unfortunately late forms will result in a delay in payment Thank you for your hard work and continued commitment to Enron
